name: Model and Infer
environment_history: conda install --prefix PROJECT_ENVIRONMENT_DIRECTORY_PATH --channel conda-forge --yes jupyterlab nodejs yarn twine pyinstaller pefile git git-lfs bfg awscli yapf isort pylama numpy pandas xlrd hdf5 pytables scipy scikit-learn statsmodels cython matplotlib plotly pycrypto bcrypt click flask flask-cors requests biopython rpy2 r-mass
conda install --channel bioconda --yes dwgsim skewer fastqc picard seqtk htslib samtools bwa kallisto freebayes bcftools snpeff
